entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
